title: Ranked is 100% luck
body:
It doesn't even matter if you go 100/0, if you have 4 feeding teammates you will lose.

Even if you are bronze 5 and go 0/100, if your team is fed you will win.

I hope riot will fix the system so it isn't based on luck if you rank up.

replies.body:
Umm.. Not really.

Faker didn't get to worlds with "luck"

-GL,HF

nope. if you are 100-0, depending on what champ you play, you should be able to kill the whole enemy team by looking at them.

If you can't your building wrong or playing Nautilus.

How is hard to grasp that IF YOU ARE GOOD ENOUGH YOU WILL CLIMB REGARDLESS OF YOUR TEAM? ...eventually

Challenger players don't sit in Plat for 6 months saying, "sht, fuk these teams" at the start of every season. They are already challenger again within like 50 games.

Doesn't matter how strong you are if the enemy team stacks all their CC on you because you're the only threat. You could be full build Draven literally 1 hit killing people with Q's but if you can't even get a Q off then it's not gonna end well aint it buddy.

I didn't say it would be easy, im simply saying it can be done.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/79913384/200743579?tab=overview

Jinx single-handedly won this game for my team. Look at damage dealt to champions.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7p6Pyh6e,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-21T08:09:25.832+0000)
>
> nope. if you are 100-0, depending on what champ you play, you should be able to kill the whole enemy team by looking at them.
> 
> If you can't your building wrong or playing Nautilus.
> 
> How is hard to grasp that IF YOU ARE GOOD ENOUGH YOU WILL CLIMB REGARDLESS OF YOUR TEAM? ...eventually
> 
> Challenger players don't sit in Plat for 6 months saying, "sht, fuk these teams" at the start of every season. They are already challenger again within like 50 games.

Pretty sure a fed Nautilus is scarier than you think.

Reading this, oh my God.

It made me cringe so much.
More like 40% luck. Some roles can remove some of the luck factor, like mid, jungle and top. It's pretty hard to solo carry from support if your top and mid are garbage.
